text: Cesare Salvadori (22 September 1941 - 8 August 2021) was an Italian sabre fencer.Cesare Salvadori, Ã¨ morto a 79 anni la leggenda della scherma italiana He won a gold medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics and two silver medals at the 1964 and 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Turin, Italy. Salvadori died on 8 August 2021 in Turin at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Italian fencers Category:Sportspeople from Turin
title: Cesare Salvadori
